title: I'm still awaiting an answer to my question about why there's a no parking sign within a few feet of a parking meter. (I would be happy to send you a photo). This is at Dock & Front.
text: Hello. Sorry for the delay in the answer to your question! I've sent a reminder to the reporter. In case you'd prefer an immediate answer, contact information for the city is available here: http://www.wilmingtonnc.gov/departments/city-manager/parking
